body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Austin Garcia and the customer's name is Diana Sanders.  The conversation is about Strolid Motors (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling A1 Solutions. My name is Alex. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, my name is Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about my account. I'm having trouble logging in.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see, Sarah. I'll need a couple of details to help you with that. Could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's sarah.jones at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Could you also provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my account number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. Let me check your account information. Please hold for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Sarah. I've reset your login credentials. You should receive an email shortly with new instructions. Is there anything else you need help with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, Alex.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah! Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
